title: Ouma ga Blue
original_name: 逢魔ヶＢＬＵＥ; おうまがブルー
sinopse:
Twilight is the time for the demon. A tribe that has been forgotten for a long time is slowly make some movement in today world....

Marie heard a cat meowing, when she follows the voice, this events leads her to a chain of events that will forever change her life.
